truth-or-dare-icebreaker.question: Who has the best hair in the room?
If you could switch lives with anyone for a day, who would it be and why?
What's the worst haircut you've ever had?
What’s the grossest thing you’ve ever discovered in your food?
What’s the strangest food you’ve ever eaten?
What’s a talent you have that most people wouldn’t guess?
What’s the weirdest place you’ve ever fallen asleep?
What’s the most embarrassing way you’ve hurt yourself?
What’s the most ridiculous thing you’ve done out of boredom?
Have you ever lied about liking a gift? What was it?
What’s the worst assumption someone’s made about you?
Have you ever pretended not to see someone in public to avoid them? Why?
What’s the most embarrassing playlist you have on your phone?
What’s the worst social media trend you’ve participated in?
What’s the most childish thing you still enjoy doing?
What’s the most awkward way you’ve said goodbye to someone?
What’s the most unusual item you’ve purchased late at night?
What’s the weirdest thing you’ve done to avoid confrontation?
What’s the strangest thing you’ve done while procrastinating?
What’s the most unusual way you’ve made a friend?
What’s the weirdest food combination you secretly enjoy?
Have you ever had an imaginary friend?
Do you believe in ghosts?
What movie is your guilty pleasure?
What objectively terrible song do you love to listen to?
What’s the best piece of advice you’ve been given?
What is your favorite book of all time?
What’s something that overwhelms you?
If you could choose a new name, what would you pick?
Where’s one place you’re dying to visit?
What app do you spend the most time on?
If you could only hear one song for the rest of your life, what would it be?
What word do you hate the most?
What’s your biggest fantasy?
Who annoys you most in your life?
What country do you want to run away to?
What would you change about society?
Which reality show do you secretly want to go on?
What would you buy if you won the lottery?
Do you think you’d survive as a character in a horror movie?
If you could choose anyone in the room to be president, who would it be and why?
What television show is your go-to comfort watch?
If you met a genie, what would your three wishes be?
What celebrity do you think is overrated?
What's one job you could never do?
What would you do if you had the power to become invisible?
After you've dropped a piece of food, what's the longest time you've left it on the floor before eating it?
What's one useless skill you'd love to learn anyway?
What is that one thing you would never do for all the money in the world?
What's the last YouTube video you watched?
Who's the last person who called you?
What's a skill you wish you had?
What's something you're embarrassed that you're good at?
What was your most humbling moment?
What's the most ridiculous thing you have an emotional attachment to?
Who do you text the most?
What would you rate your looks on a scale of 1 to 10?
What do you love most about my body?
Only talk in whispers for the next 3 rounds.
Speak in an accent for the next 3 rounds.
Let the group pick a nickname for you and use it for the rest of the game.
Sing the chorus of your favorite song at full volume.
Talk in the third person until it's your turn again.
Act like your favorite animal until someone guesses what it is.
Try to juggle 3 random objects in the room.
Speak in rhymes for the next 3 rounds.
Imitate a celebrity of the group’s choice for two minutes.
Do a dramatic reading of a random Wikipedia article.
Balance a random object on your head for one round.
Talk without using your tongue for the next 2 rounds.
Speak in a robot voice for the next 3 rounds.
truth-or-dare-icebreaker.punishment: Take 2 Shots now or Take a Shot. everytime you forget.

truth-or-dare-icebreaker.question: Close your eyes and try to identify an object by touch alone.
Attempt to moonwalk across the room without falling.
Put an ice cube in your mouth and try to sing a song until it melts.
Use only charades to communicate for the next 2 rounds.
truth-or-dare-icebreaker.punishment: Take 2 Shots now or take a shot everytime you forget.

truth-or-dare-icebreaker.question: Eat a snack while holding your hands behind your back.
Narrate the game for the next round.

truth-or-dare-icebreaker.punishment: Take 2 Shots now or take a shot everytime you forget.

truth-or-dare-icebreaker.question: Move in slow motion for a round.

truth-or-dare-icebreaker.question: Do your best impersonation of a pirate.
Describe the plot of your favorite movie as ridiculously as you can.
Do the Macarena without music.
Show us your screen time report.
Try to drink a glass of water without using your hands or a straw.
Burp the alphabet.
Keep your eyes closed until it’s your turn again.
truth-or-dare-icebreaker.punishment: Take 2 Shots now or take a shot everytime you forget.

truth-or-dare-icebreaker.question: Sit in the corner of the room without speaking to anyone for the next 3 rounds.

truth-or-dare-icebreaker.question: Talk without closing your mouth.
truth-or-dare-icebreaker.punishment: Take 2 Shots now or take a shot everytime you forget.

truth-or-dare-icebreaker.question: Wear toilet paper as a scarf.
Hold your nose while talking for 3 rounds.
truth-or-dare-icebreaker.punishment: Take 2 Shots now or take a shot everytime you forget.

truth-or-dare-icebreaker.question: Balance a book on your head for a round.
Talk like a news reporter.
Speak in only song lyrics for a whole round.

truth-or-dare-icebreaker.question: Make a phone call and speak only in movie quotes.
Speak only in questions for the next 3 rounds.
Tape your mouth shut for 2 rounds.
Talk as if you have no teeth until its your turn again.
truth-or-dare-icebreaker.punishment: Take 2 Shots now or take a shot everytime you forget.

truth-or-dare-icebreaker.question: Make a tin foil hat and wear it for the rest of the night.
